Name: Ultimate Surfing Buddy!
Title: Ultimate Surfing Buddy!
Desc: "Just find yourself a good swell, pick up a suitable surfboard, and you too can experience the joys of surfing whenever you want!"

Talent.Name: Ultimate Surfing Buddy!
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Can only be played when there are at least a total of 2 Summons on the field (Both sides' Summons count):</color> Randomly triggers an End Phase effect on one of yours' and the opponent's Summons.
